price: در آنجا نه رنجى به آنان مى‌رسد و نه از آنجا بیرون رانده مى‌شوند.
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
